title: Solidity implements the purchase of NFT using Token
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title: Use the ERC721 standard to issue your own NFT contract, and mint several NFTs with images. Please upload the images and Meta Json data to a decentralized storage service, and provide the NFT link on OpenSea.

Write a simple NFT market contract, using your own issued Token to buy and sell NFTs. The functions include:
1. `list()`: Implement the listing function, where the NFT holder can set a price (how many tokens are needed to purchase the NFT) and list the NFT on the NFT market.
2. `buyNFT()`: Implement the purchase function for NFTs, where users transfer the specified token quantity and receive the corresponding NFT.

Please post your code or GitHub link in your answer.

description: The challenge is used to implement and issue NFT contracts, master the use of decentralized storage (such as IPFS), and understand the buying and selling of Tokens and NFTS.
